Description: Selection of source for position register channel 2.
0 / Pact Encoder 1: Source for position register
1 / Pact Encoder 2: Source for position register
channel 2 is off and status bit keeps last state
1 / On: Position Register channel 2 is on
2 / Off (set state 0): Position Register channel 2 is
off and status bit is set to 0
3 / Off (set state 1): Position Register channel 2 is
off and status bit is set to 1
Comparison value A for position register channel
Comparison value B for position register channel
